journey_steps.description: Potential customer becomes aware of the airline service
Customer researches about the airline and its services
Customer compares the airline service with its competitors
Customer decides to book a flight with the airline
Customer goes through the process of booking a flight
Customer experiences the pre-flight services like seating arrangements, meals selection etc.
Customer uses the on-flight services such as meals, entertainment etc.
Customer experiences the post-flight services like baggage collection
Customer interacts with the customer service for any inquiries, complaints or assistance
Customer decides to book another flight with the airline
